name: The Returning of the Quantum Cat
name_original: The Returning of the Quantum Cat
description:
The Returning of the Quantum Cat
Former hacker. He left to live in the forest. But he’s back. Back for his cat. “I JUST
CAME TO GET BACK MY CAT…” 

How to playTo look scene again: press on scene title
For use item on another item/object: first press item in inventory then press item/object
For use item itself: press item in inventory twice

f2-save, f3-load, esc - menu

Note

You can download this (and other) game(s) for PC/Linux/MacOS X/Android/S60 and others OSes here: http://instead.syscall.ru
Just install INSTEAD interpreter. The game itself is here: http://instead-games.ru/game.php?ID=107
